Localization.Name: Crusader Industries
Localization.Description: Makers of an extensive fleet of cargo, vehicle and data transport ships, and cutting edge shuttles, Crusader Industries is a titan of the aerospace industry. It is a company so powerful and prominent that it purchased a gas giant in the Stanton system to house its current headquarters.
